channel.title: Cloudfront on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudfront on SpiderSoft

item.title: How to test golang written lambda function locally
item.description: For a while I was looking for an easy we to test my lambda functions written in golang locally. We have awesome tools like LocalStack but this is not what I was looking for. I wanted to test my lambda function locally, without any dependencies. Something lighter without Docker . I will show you how to do that.

item.title: How to host static website on AWS CloudFront
item.description: I was looking for a way to host a static website on AWS. I found a couple of ways to do that. I decided to use CloudFront as a CDN and S3 as an origin. I will show you how to do that.
